          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az első világháború borzalmai</string>
            <string language="en">The terrors of the First World War</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Terror des ersten Weltkrieges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les terreurs de la première guerre mondiale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os terrors da primeira guerra de mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terrore della prima guerra mondiale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι τρόμοι του πρώτου παγκόσμιου πολέμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los terrores de la primera guerra mundial</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A menekülő polgári lakosság</string>
            <string language="en">Civil inhabitants on the run</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">,  polgári áldozatok,  civil lakosság,  fenyegetés,  erőszak,  </string>
            <string language="en">civilian victims, civil population, threat, force</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zivileinwohner auf dem Durchlauf</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Habitants civils sur le passage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Habitantes civis no funcionamento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abitanti civili sul funzionamento</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αστικοί κάτοικοι στο τρέξιμο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Habitantes civiles en el funcionamiento</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zivilopfer, Zivilbevölkerung, Drohung, Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">victimes civiles, population civile, menace, force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vítimas civis, população civil, ameaça, força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">πολιτικά θύματα, αστικός πληθυσμός, απειλή, δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
